entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
